name: National Center for Lesbian Rights
description: NCLR provides educational workshops and legal counseling service for precedent-setting cases on behalf of lesbians, gay men, bisexuals, and transgender individuals. Telephone advice and counseling are available for legal issues, such as custody/visitation, adoption, partnership benefits and legal protection, employment discrimination, immigration/asylum, youth rights, and elder law. Attorney referrals are available nationally. NCLR publishes legal manuals specifically for Family Law issues. Both
